thread.title: Public Services Commission Report.

author: tribuneindia.com
title: Public Services Commission Report.
text: AN Indian contemporary learns from an esteemed English correspondent that the majority of the Commissioners are opposed to Indian interests in their recommendations. On this ground, our contemporary urges the immediate publication of the report. Whatever be the nature of the report we consider its publication without further delay is necessary to elicit public opinion. The report of the Royal Commission on Indian Finance and Currency was published. The appointment of the Royal Commission on Public Services is the outcome of years of continued representation to the Home Government by the whole country.
